item.title: Queues Are Not Always The Answer
item.description: I feel developers reach for the queue all too quickly. Iâ€™m talking about stand alone message queue services like RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ etc. etc. Not an in memory data structure (which in fact can be all you need sometimes)
